channel.title: Getting downloads from code source?
channel.description:
I was recently looking at this video for a online 15th prestige hack for black ops and he gives you the website link and on the website has the link to the 3 files you need and to get them, but you have to complete surveys witch probably never end or they probably keep saying ok 1 more survey so is there a way to get the direct download link from either the website code source ore the survey code source?
I am guessing that its probably fake and hes just getting money off of every survey completed and the downloads will never appear but if they are is there a shortcut or something to them?
Or does anybody here host 15th lobbies?

item.title: Getting downloads from code source?
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

Yea thats what i was guessing, i did one survey and it said ok just complete this one last thing so i said f that.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting downloads from code source?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

If it keeps giving you survey after survey, chances are its fake.

Read full topic
